Action.author: skarim
Action.body: Seems to be a timing issue. Last discussion with Keith he said he had found the issue. Will discuss with him further. ~keithsmith

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: thanks ~skarim : As this is timeout issue we can re-trigger Jenkins job with *reverify* in reply or let me know I will re-trigger from Jenkins

Action.author: skarim
Action.body: Marking this as Done. Increased waiting time between starting server and executing test cases against. The sleep is now for 10 seconds, that should be sufficient amount of time to prevent this issue from occurring on Jenkins.
